text.section: Subject to the provisions of this subtitle, a person may recover compensation from the Fund for an actual pre-need trust fund loss that occurred on or after January 1, 2010, and is based on an act or omission as described in subsection (b) of this section.

The amount recovered for any claim against the Fund:
May not exceed the actual monetary loss suffered; and
May not include noneconomic, consequential, or punitive damages.
A funeral establishment shall include in each sales contract that is provided by the funeral establishment a written notice to the buyer that the buyer may file a claim with the Fund.
